Parameter.name: ApiVersion
Parameter.description: The version tag of the API used in the URL.

Parameter.name: serviceRootUrl
Parameter.description: The base URL of the SensorThings Server without version.

Parameter.name: defaultCount
Parameter.description: The default value for the $count query option.

Parameter.name: defaultTop
Parameter.description: The default value for the $top query option.

Parameter.name: maxTop
Parameter.description: The maximum allowed value for the $top query option.

Parameter.name: maxDataSize
Parameter.description: The maximum allowed estimated data size (in bytes) for responses.

Parameter.name: useAbsoluteNavigationLinks
Parameter.description: If true, navigationLinks are absolute, otherwise relative.

Parameter.name: mqtt.mqttServerImplementationClass
Parameter.description: The java class used for running the MQTT server (must implement MqttServer interface)

Parameter.name: mqtt.Enabled
Parameter.description: Specifies wether MQTT support will be enabled or not.

Parameter.name: mqtt.Port
Parameter.description: The port the MQTT server runs on.

Parameter.name: mqtt.QoS
Parameter.description: Quality of Service Level for MQTT messages.

Parameter.name: mqtt.SubscribeMessageQueueSize
Parameter.description: Queue size for messages to be pubslihed via MQTT.

Parameter.name: mqtt.SubscribeThreadPoolSize
Parameter.description: Number of threads use to dispatch MQTT notifications.

Parameter.name: mqtt.CreateMessageQueueSize
Parameter.description: Queue size for create observation requests via MQTT .

Parameter.name: mqtt.CreateThreadPoolSize
Parameter.description: Number of threads use to dispatch observation creation requests.

Parameter.name: mqtt.Host
Parameter.description: The external IP address or host name the MQTT server should listen on. Set to 0.0.0.0 to listen on all interfaces.

Parameter.name: mqtt.internalHost
Parameter.description: The internal host name of the MQTT server.

Parameter.name: mqtt.WebsocketPort
Parameter.description: The port the MQTT server is reachable via WebSocket.

Parameter.name: persistence.persistenceManagerImplementationClass
Parameter.description: The java class used for persistence (must implement PersistenceManaher interface)

Parameter.name: persistence.db_jndi_datasource
Parameter.description: JNDI data source name
